MYOCORTEX is a premier (world-class) sport performance, health and wellness training facility that uses individual specific modalities to optimize human performance and function. Our passion is to develop and train muscle contraction using processed execution through human movement.

At MCX we analyze our clients’ individual biomechanics and design a micro-progressive strength and conditioning regimen that includes isometric exercises and Muscle Activation TechniquesTM (MAT) which enables us to work with all ages and fitness levels.
